comments.body:
This would be great. Though with spawning rules needing light level 0 instead of 7 for mobs this became less pressing for me. 

Additionally or alternatively; I would like a "Pacify" power. That mobs in range won't attack you unless provoked (a bit like piglin behavior)
YEP WE HAVE IT

Hi! We appreciate your passion and ideas, but please keep your ideas to a single idea per post. That way people know what they‚Äôre voting for!  Since your post contains more than one unique item, block, or feature we must move it. Please feel free to create new posts for each of your ideas. 

Please check out this link (https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360004442111-Creating-Great-Ideas), be sure to use search, and join existing threads in progress (we read ALL the comments).
This is such a dumb idia, it makes no sense

I remember dropping an idea similar to this on the reddit once. Rather than dying slime balls, you would combine a potion with a slime block to make it a different color, and it would affect the block in different ways.

Strength (red block) would have a higher bounciness. Weakness (grey block) would be less bouncy. Jump Boost (a different shade of green) would launch entities further when pushed by a piston. Swiftness (sky blue?) would make slime blocks that wouldn't affect adjacent blocks, but only the ones on the axis it was moved by a piston, or something like that.

It was something along those lines. I don't think they'll ever go with this, though. It's not like we can make special slime blocks for every potion, either.

Simply dying them to get weird effects DEFINITELY won't work.
I think it should be crafted with two shulker shells and a jukebox
That‚Äôs an actually good idea, most people here comment dumb things that would be useless.
Bone armor is no worse than leather. The Chukchi and many other peoples made armor from bones.

please vote :~[

 

 

please

I like this idea. Also, you know how ghasts are weak against cobblestone but strong against obsidian? Maybe there could be a similar reversal where some mobs are strong against diamond, but weak against iron.
This could also work on berries. If you wax them in the growing state they would stay like that. And that would create a nice bush.
Thanks to everyone who is voteing  is greatly appreciated

Stained wood should only be craftable from a stripped log or wood of any tree variety (not from Nether fungus). Eight stripped logs/wood surrounding a dye would yield eight "Stripped DYE COLOR Log" or "Stripped DYE COLOR Wood". Texture would be dyed Oak, regardless of wood variant used, e.g., stained doors and trapdoors would match Oak Doors and Oak Trapdoors in style. All subsequent crafting with the stained logs would replace the word "Oak" with the name of the dye color, e.g., "Magenta Slab". Items such as sticks, ladders, chests, etc., that have no wood specification, would be craftable but would not be stained.
you have my suport
I think instead of double it I think you should be able to craft new stuff such as obsidian or ruby or emerald things I think it should be called the aeon forge #cube kid
Some of this sounds stupid op. Especially hardness. Also lava luck sounds like worse netherite
Hope you like it!
your idea is the best i ever heard! imagine something like that but with ores!
Because bottles are unstackable, it can be really hard to craft a bunch of honey at once. If using the cauldron to craft it could make this faster, that would be great!
I think it would cost less items than crafting table's to make such blocks by cauldron.
This is a very great idea!
Witches could have an animation similar to Evokers that causes slime cauldrons to create actual Slimes
How about instead of dropping you just right click? That would create layers and make crafting a lot faster.
It would also open up more building possibilities.

I really like your idea. And would add soups and stews to the cauldron recipes. Cooked over a campfire or open flame. Milk and mushrooms to make cream of mushroom soup. Carrots, beets, and potatoes to make vegetable soup. As well as all the stews already in game should not be crafted in crafting table. But cooked in the cauldron , because it makes sense to have better foods at your base/camp then on the go.
It would also add more usefulness to scute
...but fire aspect works on all swords
Other swords have fire aspect are u good in the head

For the ones that can't figure this out by themselves:

He is obviously saying "With fire aspect by default"
No, it would ruin the enchantment meta
For those three saying nonsense do u know how hard it is to find the stuff
Did you make those textures? If you did, great job!

Thanks, yes i made the textures, im making a resource pack with all the things i would like to see in minecraft (only new blocks and mob variations since im too lazy to actually model something totally new)

I love the textures! My main concern is how rare elder guardians are. These don't seem like something you could build many things with, unless there were a way to replace elder guardians in monuments after defeating them.

Well that is a problem, maybe they could be very rarely dropped by normal guardians (like maybe 2% chance) or found in buried treasure chests and (again very rarely) shipwrecks? But still, the easiest way to get them would be to kill elder guardians, maybe they could respawn after like 10-20 in-game days
Maybe they could regen health slowly too if you don't hurt them in too long of a time, like a boss mob. By the way they are also considered a boss mob in bedrock eddtion, too.
I suggested this on reddit back in around 2016-17. Definitely good to see there's other people that want this added.

I really like this idea! Perhaps we could make it slightly more accessible by simply making the crafting recipe the variant of Prismarine you want with white dye? Perhaps it works like terracotta, and you must surround a white dye with the block to get 8? Of course it could still be a rare drop as well.

Actually that's a great idea, maybe it could also be sold by traveling merchants or by smelting prismarine (im not sure why but i think it would work) but it would require a lot of fuel to smelt a block

I would consider White Prismarine to be a sort of trophy item. Each Elder Guardians should drop some shards but not enough to craft a block. Killing all of the Elder Guardians would give you enough for a block. Then, each Monument you find can give you more and more blocks

This is an amazing idea. I'm shocked at how Mojang hasn't leaped onto this opportunity already.

However, another user had the idea to call it 'bleached prismarine' which I think makes more sense because elder guardians aren't exactly white, but they are certainly more bleached than normal prismarine.

Great job on the textures! 'Dark white prismarine' does sound strange though.

Keep up the good work!
I think there should be a way to respawn the elder guardians though.
Ooooh! What if ocean monuments were partially (very small amount though) made of the bleached/white prismarine? That would make it more easily accessible.
That sounds amazing, give a cat a black carpet and it gets a skeleton sweater ect.
I like that idea And I think minecraft Should have something like that. :)

Sea shells should be added to minecraft, and found on sand on beaches. They could also be replanted, and turned into dyes, like how flowers are able to. They would vary in three sizes. Tiny shells, the size of buttons in MC, normal shells, the size of a dandelion in minecraft, and big shells, the size of a Poppy in MC.
They should be placable in a similar fashion to candles!
It would be a good idea as a decorative complement, but they can also be used to make small tools, such as hammers.
When used as a (very cool) decorative element, they could be applied to the floor like the pickles, to a maximum of four. And still, 4 rocks would make up 1 cobblestone
And you could throw the rocks on mobs, like snowballs and eggs
There should also be hammers , by using hammers on cobblestone you get rocks
Yes I would like more music too!
yes
Yeah like pigstep
I want more by lena Raine

Please, please! I have a system set up in my base for auto play of all disks... yes all disks! Need more for a longer playlist that will lead to lots more enjoyment.

Mojang Please add Vivaldi four seasons (spring) to Minecraft!!!

Please Mojang!!!!
